job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience

jd: From: shaik mohammed, www.abidisolutions.com smohammed@abidisolutions.com Reply to: smohammed@abidisolutions.com Job Title: Oracle PL/SQL Backend DeveloperLocation: Philadelphia, PA (Hybrid)Visa: all visa is workable except H1B, OPT and CPT Need local to PA, NJ & NY(No H1B, OPT and CPT)Note: Local Candidates Required:This position requires a local presence due to onsite work components.Must be strong PL/SQL backend developersMust take a PL/SQL test as the first step of the process because we have to submit it to the client. I will talk to them after they take the assessment.Position Overview:As an Oracle PL/SQL Backend Developer, you will be responsible for creating and maintaining back-end software in Oracle PL/SQL. You will collaborate with senior developers and internal teams, participate in requirements analysis, and provide ongoing production support.Key Responsibilities:Collaborate with senior developers to produce high-quality software.Participate in requirements analysis and interpret business requirement documents.Write clean, scalable, and functional code; perform unit testing; prepare applications for deployment to production.Fix defects in legacy code and improve existing software.Work with source control on multiple simultaneous branches.Provide third-tier support to the help desk on assigned weekends and holidays as needed.Required Skills:Proven expert-level experience as a PL/SQL Application Developer using Toad and SQL Plus.Ability to create views, packages, functions, and stored procedures in PL/SQL.Proficient in working with collections and asynchronous processes.Ability to interpret execution plans and optimize queries/functions.Experience in creating complex DML and debugging as needed.Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills with strong attention to detail.Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or equivalent experience.
